info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:02PM EDT until June 02 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Caldwell County in western North Carolina... Central Burke County in western North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 401 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Morganton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Morganton, Valdese, Gamewell, Cajah`s Mountain, Drexel, Connelly Springs, Rutherford College, Lake Rhodhiss and Table Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
